structured_notes_xml:
<structured_notes>
    <project_name>E-Commerce Platform - ShopEasy</project_name>
    <company_overview>Not specified</company_overview>
    <attendees>
        <attendee>CEO</attendee>
        <attendee>CTO</attendee>
        <attendee>Product Manager</attendee>
        <attendee>Lead Developer</attendee>
        <attendee>UX Designer</attendee>
        <attendee>Marketing Director</attendee>
    </attendees>
    <meeting_date>November 2, 2025</meeting_date>
    <meeting_objective>Main e-commerce platform discussion</meeting_objective>
    <key_discussion_points>
        <point>User authentication and social logins</point>
        <point>Product catalog with search and filters</point>
        <point>Shopping cart functionality and payment processing</point>
        <point>Order management system and admin dashboard</point>
        <point>Microservices architecture and scalability</point>
        <point>Wireframes and design system for user experience</point>
        <point>Technical stack and infrastructure requirements</point>
    </key_discussion_points>
    <pain_points>
        <pain_point>Scalability and performance concerns</pain_point>
        <pain_point>Complexity and feature creep</pain_point>
    </pain_points>
    <requirements>
        <requirement>User registration and login</requirement>
        <requirement>Product listing and details</requirement>
        <requirement>Shopping cart and checkout functionality</requirement>
        <requirement>Payment processing and order management</requirement>
        <requirement>Admin dashboard and user account management</requirement>
        <requirement>Mobile app and push notifications</requirement>
        <requirement>Recommendation engine and live chat support</requirement>
    </requirements>
    <decisions_made>
        <decision>Phase 1: Core e-commerce features</decision>
        <decision>Technical stack: React, Node.js, PostgreSQL, and AWS</decision>
    </decisions_made>
    <action_items>
        <action_item>Develop wireframes and design system</action_item>
        <action_item>Implement technical stack and infrastructure</action_item>
    </action_items>
    <technical_constraints>
        <constraint>Scalability and performance concerns</constraint>
        <constraint>Complexity and feature creep</constraint>
    </technical_constraints>
    <stakeholders>
        <stakeholder>CEO</stakeholder>
        <stakeholder>CTO</stakeholder>
        <stakeholder>Product Manager</stakeholder>
        <stakeholder>Lead Developer</stakeholder>
        <stakeholder>UX Designer</stakeholder>
        <stakeholder>Marketing Director</stakeholder>
    </stakeholders>
</structured_notes>
